Over the next few weeks,I just kept   _   our conversation in my head.Yes,I could make a long list of reasons why I couldn't become an archaeologist.Strangely,however,these reasons seemed more like   _   .

Seven years later,I   _    a graduate degree and became an archaeologist.39 _ ,I found that as I reached towards my goals through   _   and difficulties,I became happier and more confident.In this way,my brother changed my life.Perhaps,you also can change your life by asking yourself"Why not?".
